about_the_game:
You have to play as a hikikomori girl who dies in an accident and comes to life in a new world in the guise of a magician. The new world is suffering from the invasion of goblins, led by the "Pale King". To return to your world you need to stop the invasion and kill the goblin king. The local goddess keeps you from dying on the battlefield and brings you back again and again saving your leveling progress as you must save her beloved world at all costs!

Peculiarities:


  • Short runs (to pass 1 location you need to survive 5 minutes and defeat the boss)
  • Automatic casting of spells (some magic allows you to choose the direction of application)
  • Saved leveling (after the race you return to the shelter and improve your character)
  • 10 destructive spells from 5 schools of magic
  • Each element has unique effects on enemies
  • 5 unique locations (a wonderful soundtrack is recorded for each world)
  • 8 bosses with individual set of skills
detailed_description:
You have to play as a hikikomori girl who dies in an accident and comes to life in a new world in the guise of a magician. The new world is suffering from the invasion of goblins, led by the "Pale King". To return to your world you need to stop the invasion and kill the goblin king. The local goddess keeps you from dying on the battlefield and brings you back again and again saving your leveling progress as you must save her beloved world at all costs!

Peculiarities:


  • Short runs (to pass 1 location you need to survive 5 minutes and defeat the boss)
  • Automatic casting of spells (some magic allows you to choose the direction of application)
  • Saved leveling (after the race you return to the shelter and improve your character)
  • 10 destructive spells from 5 schools of magic
  • Each element has unique effects on enemies
  • 5 unique locations (a wonderful soundtrack is recorded for each world)
  • 8 bosses with individual set of skills

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Goblin Survivors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Core i3,i5,i7,E3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 820M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Core i3,i5,i7,E3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 820M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Goblin Survivors - casual goblin destruction simulator with roguelike elements. Pump up destructive magic, erase hundreds of vile monsters, survive in battles with bosses! Make up your set of spells before foray into the lands of the enemy, for the most effective extermination!
